p:
Thirty-eight studies were selected for the second screening by reading of full texts. After the application of the eligibility criteria, 23 papers were excluded because:
Fourteen met the exclusions criteria: studies on pathogenicity and diagnosis, n = 9; papers not dealing with surveillance and control strategies applied for eradication, n = 5,
Three full texts were not available
Six were written in languages other than the included languages: Dutch ( n = 4), German ( n = 2).
